power.title: Avernian Eruption
power.fluff: Acrid orange flames hiss up from beneath the ground, then suddenly ignite in a thundering detonation, burning any creature in the area with searing flames

section.name: Target:
section.text: Each creature in the burst

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d12 + Charisma modifier fire damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Each target takes ongoing 5 fire damage (save ends).

section.name: Infernal Pact:
section.text: Each target takes a -2 penalty to the first saving throw it makes against this ongoing damage.

power.title: Blistering Torrent
power.fluff: As you utter blistering words, your foes feel a dull pain that crescendos into a sharp pain and leaves them unable to hear for a time

section.name: Target:
section.text: Each creature in the blast

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d10 + Charisma modifier necrotic damage, and the target is deafened until the end of the encounter.

section.name: Dark Pact:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, all creatures have concealment against the target if they are more than 2 squares away from it.

section.name: Infernal Pact:
section.text: The target is also slowed (save ends).

section.name: Sorcerer-King Pact:
section.text: The target is also weakened until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage, and the target is deafened until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Crackling Fire
power.fluff: An eldritch storm of fire and lightning erupts from you to scour your foes, leaving them vulnerable to future attacks

section.name: Elemental Pact:
section.text: You can choose to replace one of the damage types this power deals with your current elemental affinity. If you do, the power changes both its keyword and the vulnerable it bestows to match your affinity.

section.name: Target:
section.text: Each creature in the blast

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 3d6 + Charisma modifier fire and lightning damage, and the target is scoured by eldritch energies (save ends).
While scoured, the target has vulnerable 5 fire and vulnerable 5 lightning.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

power.title: Crown of Madness
power.fluff: You cause an illusory, twisted crown to appear around the target's head and to psychically assault the enemy, causing it to lose the ability to distinguish friend from foe

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Will

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d8 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and the target must use a free interrupt to make a melee basic attack against a creature of your choice.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target is subjected to madness (save ends).
While the target is subjected to madness, you can use the following action once per round, starting on your next turn.

section.name: Minor Action:
section.text: The target makes a melee basic attack against a creature of your choice as a free reaction. If it misses this attack, it takes psychic damage equal to your Intelligence modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.
